title: Sculpture 6/58
provenance_text:
Emil Cimiotti [b. 1927], Stuttgart, Germany [1]; purchased from the artist by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, December 1958 [2].

Notes:
[1]. The sculpture was exhibited (no. 92) in "The 1958 Pittsburgh Bicentennial International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, December 1958 - February 1959.
[2]. The sculpture was purchased for Carnegie Institute from the International by the Department of Fine Arts' Women's Committee. It was accessioned on December 17, 1958. Payment to the artist was sent on March 13, 1959.
